short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a precis (summary) of the content from current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Precis is a tool that helps users quickly understand the main points of a webpage or article by extracting and presenting the most important information in a concise format. 

Users can activate the extension by clicking on its icon in the Chrome browser toolbar, which brings up a summary of the webpage in a pop-up window. 

This can be useful for individuals who don't have a lot of time to read long pieces of content or for those who want a general overview before diving into the details.
